types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_SAP_ProjectCreate
types1:Item.types1:Description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

process.name: Process_SAP_ProjectCreate
process.description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

operation.expression: <WorkPackageSet xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> { for $Line in $input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityProductDetails[OpportunityProduct_ProductCode != '' and (SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency = $input.in_ProjectCurrency or OpportunityProduct_ProductCode = 'GR-RC-OV-012' or OpportunityProduct_ProductCode = 'DV0001' or fn:starts-with(OpportunityProduct_ID, 'FirstTimeCustomerDefault'))] let $itemCat := switch ($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method ) (:PS01=Fixed Price; PS02=Time & Expenses; PS06=Periodic Service; PS07=Usage Based:) case "Block" return "PS07" case "Default Product" return "PS02" case "List" return switch ($Line/ItemCategory ) case "PFP" return "PS01" case "PTE" return "PS02" case "PPS" return "PS06" default return "PS06" default return "PS06" ,$BillingCatS := switch ($itemCat) case "PS01" return "" case "PS02" return "" case "PS06" return "" case "PS07" return "NON_BILL" default return "" where fn:not(fn:starts-with($Line/OpportunityProduct_ID, 'FirstTimeCustomerDefault')) or (fn:starts-with($Line/OpportunityProduct_ID, 'FirstTimeCustomerDefault') and (switch ($Line/OpportunityProduct_ID) case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault1" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct1_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault2" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct2_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault3" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct3_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault4" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct4_Exists default return 9)!=1) return <results m:isArray="true"> <WorkPackageName>{util:iif($Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode = '', fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 1, 57) || '_S1', $Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode || '_' || fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 1, 54) || '_S1')} </WorkPackageName> <Description>{util:iif($Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode = '', fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 58), fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 55) || ' - ' || $Line/Country__c)}</Description> <WPStartDate>{fn:concat(fn:format-dateTime($Line/OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]"), 'T00:00:00')}</WPStartDate> <WPEndDate>{fn:concat(fn:format-dateTime($Line/OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]"), 'T00:00:00')}</WPEndDate> <WorkPackageType>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', 'U') }</WorkPackageType> <UnitQuantity>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', 1 )}</UnitQuantity> <UnitId>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', $temp.tmp_Default_UnitID) }</UnitId> <YY1_ExecutionCtryWP2_cpd>{$Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode/text()}</YY1_ExecutionCtryWP2_cpd> <YY1_OpportunityID_cpd>{$input.in_OpportunityID }</YY1_OpportunityID_cpd> <DemandSet> { for $t in (1 to 9) for $cc in ('US11','IN05','IN03','SG09','GB30') return <results m:isArray="true"> <BillingControlCategory>{$BillingCatS}</BillingControlCategory> <WorkPackageName>{util:iif($Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode = '', fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 1, 57) || '_S1', $Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode || '_' || fn:substring($Line/Product2_Description, 1, 54) || '_S1')}</WorkPackageName> <Uom>{$temp.tmp_Default_UOM }</Uom> <ResType>{$temp.tmp_Default_ResType }</ResType> <ResourceId>{'T00'||$t}</ResourceId> <Effort>{$temp.tmp_Default_Effort }</Effort> <DelvryServOrg>{$cc}</DelvryServOrg> </results> } </DemandSet> </results> } </WorkPackageSet>

let $ProfitC := switch(fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c,1,2)) case "US" return "2120" case "GB" return "2121" case "IN" return "2122" case "SG" return "2123" default return "" (: let $ProfitC := "9900" :) return <ProjectSet> <ProjectID>{$input.in_ProjectID }</ProjectID> <ProjectName>{fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Description, 1, 34) || ' - ' || $input.in_ProjectCurrency} </ProjectName> <ProjectStage>{$temp.tmp_Default_ProjectStage }</ProjectStage> <OrgID>{fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c ,1,4)}</OrgID> <ProjectCategory>{$temp.tmp_Default_ProjectCategory }</ProjectCategory> <!--<Currency>{$input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityProductDetails[1]/SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency }</Currency>--> <Currency>{$input.in_ProjectCurrency }</Currency> <StartDate>{$temp.tmp_StartDate }</StartDate> <!--<StartDate>2022-01-01T00:00:00</StartDate>--> <EndDate>{$temp.tmp_EndDate }</EndDate> <ProjManagerExtId>{$output.out_PersonExternalID }</ProjManagerExtId> <Customer>{$temp.tmp_BusinessPartner }</Customer> <YY1_OrgnlOpportunityID_Cpr>{$input.in_OpportunityID }</YY1_OrgnlOpportunityID_Cpr> <CostCenter>{fn:concat(fn:concat(fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c,1,4), $ProfitC ), util:iif(fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c,1,4)='IN03' and fn:contains(fn:upper-case($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c), 'INDORE'), '51', '01'))}</CostCenter> <ProfitCenter>{$ProfitC}</ProfitCenter> <ProjectDesc>{fn:substring($input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Description, 35) }</ProjectDesc> <UseProjectBilling>{$temp.tmp_Default_UseProjectBilling }</UseProjectBilling> <RestrictTimePosting>{$temp.tmp_Default_RestrictTimePosting }</RestrictTimePosting> {$temp.tmp_ProjectRole_Create_List_PO } {$temp.tmp_WorkPackage_Create_List_PO } </ProjectSet>
let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CommercialProject[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299)) then 'Bad Request' else 'OK'
let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CommercialProject[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'Error occurred in child process, see error stack' else ''

assignment.title: Add to output Stack
assignment.operation: Project Manager not available / inactive in S4 ({$input.in_VF_SemiStructured_ALL[1]/Account[1]/ProjectManagerEmail})

operation.expression: let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_Project[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299)) then 'Bad Request' else 'OK'
let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_Project[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'Error occurred in child process, see error stack' else ''
